Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 家具設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved furniture design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomical design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹應用於寡數據狀態時的灰關聯分析模式，並針對此理論之數學及應用層面之領域提出看法，藉此使學生瞭解在無法用統計方法處理問題時之另一種解決方法。並適用於各種專業領域。1.複習線性代數----特徵值及特徵向量2.灰色理論簡介3.距離(norm)與正規化4.非標準化距離與集合距離5.關聯度的意義與灰關聯分析的程序6.主觀、客觀權重7.權重整合8.多變數分析與單變數分析9.與其他多評準決策方法的比較10.灰關聯分析的未來發展
description.en: this subject provides an introduction to the application of grey correlation analysis for multiple attributes. And, it will propose the view on the mathematic analysis with application. The students would understood that "it have an another non-statistic method to solved MADM problem". It will include the following objectives:"Review the linear algebra----eigenvalue and eigenvector."The introduction for Norm and normalization"Objective and Subjective Weighting factors"The integral for Weighting factors"The Analysis for multiple variable and single variable."Other multiple criteria decision methodologies"The future view for development of grey correlation analysis.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

description.zh: 本課程以論文研討方式學習 "機器學習" 理論之基本概念與應用及各種演算法。課程內容包含概念式學習、決策樹、圖型理論、神經網路、貝氏網路、案例式學習及支持向量機等方法。經由這門課，學生能對現代機器學習技術及其應用有基本的了解。
description.en: This is a graduate seminar-based course that provides an overview of many algorithms in machine learning and its applications. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at current research topics in machine learning covering Concept Learning, Decision Tree, Graphical Model, Neural Network, Bayesian Network, Instance-based Learning, and Support Vector Machine. Through the course, students can have the basic ideas and intuition behind modern machine learning methods.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 基礎承載力理論與分析，基礎沈陷量分析(彈性與壓密)，基礎施工，安全監測，專題討論，大地資訊系統之應用。
description.en: Advanced foundation engineering  Basic load theory and analysis ,basic settlement analysis, foundation construction,safety supervise , special subject discussion and application of geography information system.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
本課程深入網路行銷各種重點技巧，包括社群行銷與、行銷網站建置與管理、facebook網路行銷、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、Google關鍵字廣告、youtube 影音行銷，商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理等重要議題的最新研究和趨勢，並輔導同學考取網路行銷的證照。
description.en: This course will study all the internet marketing techniques and the research recently. This course will help the students to get the licence of  internet marketing.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。 本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

name.zh: 電力電子電路分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of Power Electronics Circuit

description.en: 1. Introduction of Power Electronic Circuit 2.Circuit Planning and Design 3. Dynamic Analysis and Control 4. Harmonic Analysis and Switching Technique 5. Power Integrated Circuit 6. Power Electronic Circuit System.

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 本課程探討田口品質工程方法和智慧型參數設定，以提高產品品質和製程性能。各種產品設計和製程參數值需被決定，參數的設定應使其受製造環境的變化所產生的影響減到最小，即為穩健設計。運用本方法可顯著降低製造過程中的缺陷率，並減少生產成本，同時提高產品的品質和可靠性。
description.en: This class delineates Taguchi based quality engineering methods and computational intelligence approaches to improve product quality and process performance. The nominal values of the various dimensions and design parameters need to be determined. The parameters are chosen so as to minimize the effects on performance arising from variation in manufacturing g environment. This is called robustification. The defect rate during manufacturing shows noticeable improvement, the production cost is significantly lower, and the quality and reliability of products can be enhanced.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

name.en: The application and technology of variable frequency theory (Inverter)

description.zh: 現代的工業或設備，變頻技術已廣泛地應用，除了透過變頻器執行容量調節功能之外，其所展現的節能性亦為現今能源愈趨短絀時不可或缺的必要技術。本課程以（1）變頻原理（2）電動機變速原理（3）變頻技術應用（4）應用案例分析
description.en: Modern industry or the devices ，the frequency conversion technology widely has applied, the inverter not just only for capacity control, in energy saving also is an important technology。Especially the energy will be insufficient in the future.(1) Principle of frequency variable(2)Principle of motor variable(3) The frequency conversion technology and applied(4) Case study and analysis.

description.zh: 本單元介紹台灣當紅的數位藝術潮流，並從生活面來思考，廣義的數位藝術，正如何影響我們的生活經驗。近三十年來，隨著數位科技全面改變我們的生活方式，數位藝術在國內外也逐漸受到重視，成為一種不可忽視的藝術形態。不止在純藝術方面帶來衝擊，在設計、影視、廣告等各種應用藝術的相關領域，更是帶來生產方式的全面革新，甚至是思考方式的改變。自古以來，藝術家就不停地探索適合創作的新媒材，數位科技的便利，在藝術家眼中，是另一種全新的可能性。課程含數位美學，美學可分為兩種一維螢幕內的東西如介面motion graphic, user interface, orientation.；另一為產品或裝置在環境、燈光、機械等的應用。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the most popular digital art trend and to reflect upon how the digital art in general is affecting our life experiences at the present time. In the recent thirty years, the advance of technology has entirely changed our lifestyle. Digital art has gained much attention and become a trend of art which can not be unheeded. It has an impact not only on fine arts but also on fields related to art, such as design, film and video, and advertisement. Furthermore, digital art brought about a revolutionized change of production as much as thinking. Artists have always been looking for new media for creation, and the convenience of digital technology will be a whole new possibility in the perspective. The course includes digital aesthetics which is divided into two categories: 1. things that can be seen in the one-dimension monitor such as motion graphic, user interface, and orientation, 2. the applications of products or device in different environment, lig

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。課程中以實務模式介紹為基礎，並配合個案分析以實例討論加強同學分析及解決實際問題的能力。
description.en: This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. Finally, the system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed. The curriculum of this class includes the introduction of empirical models integrated with case study so that the students will be strengthened in the capabilities of real world problem solving and quality improvement.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。 本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software. This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management. Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs. Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 時序進入Web 2.0時代，網路行銷已不再停留在發e-mail而已了 為了破除這個迷思，本課程嘗試從Web 2.0的思維，以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，將傳統行銷與新的網路行銷做一整合，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷重點議題，以簡單易懂的觀念與案例，一步步引導進入網路行銷的世界。 本課程探討一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，一對一行銷，行動商務之網路行銷、網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路行銷實務規劃之能力。
description.en: The Internet is becoming an important way to market your products and services. As a business owner, it is essential to understand the benefits of marketing on the Internet and the different options and technologies available. Simply having a web presence is not enough. Creating a website for your company is only the first step. Increasing usage of the Internet reduces traditional media's effectiveness as people give up their time for other activities such as watching TV and reading newspapers or magazines to the Internet. 1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users 3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新" 研發流程管理以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，研發與管理思維更要突破創新，以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。創新研發管理課程;以詳細介紹產品與服務研發流程與組織架構、產品與服務策略與規劃、確認與掌握客戶需求、產品與服務規格定義與確認、產品與服務概念開發與測試、品質與目標成本設計、產品研發流程之突破創新機會點(前端預防設計)、解決問題之創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)等主題。瞭解TRIZ如何應用於系統化創新構思並解?矛盾問題，快速激發最可能解?指定問題之TRIZ創新原則與指導方向，解?之問題包含工程與管理策略亦適用，TRIZ管理實務案例包含研發管理、生產管理、服務業管理、專案管理。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in an innovative thinking manner for product R&D management process, including product planning, concept development, system design, detail design, testing and refinement, and ramp-up production. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 12 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, project management, service industry management, and production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students involving creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 本課程期透過建立學生正確的研究觀念，以培養論文研究與寫作之基礎能力。根據論文寫作方法之需求，分別從建立正確的研究態度、質性研究、探索性研究設計、研究個案探討、論文格式及研究程序加以研討，讓學生了解研究方法的本質、研究的意義、過程與方法，以及研究設計的基本概念與特性；進而瞭解如何進行質性與量化研究、資料蒐集、資料處理與統計分析，並管理研究的設計與執行程序。此外，藉由本課程促使學生能應用各種不同的統計方法及統計軟體以分析商管領域等相關資料，學習撰寫研究論文並準備口頭報告，以培養商業管理研究論文之撰寫、闡釋、解讀並評析各式研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objectives of this course are： 1. To introduce the basic concept of research methodology that applies in academic and practical research. 2. To learn the methods of conducting research processes, designing research strategies, collecting and analyzing research data, and preparing research proposals and reports. 3. To know how to obtain the required information through appropriate approaches in writing research papers and solving management problems.

description.zh: 課程主要內容如下: 1.創業前的主要功課,產業分析鎖定及環境scan 2.創業的成功失敗因素分析 3.創業前的SWOT分析 4.創業專業知識->財務規劃及理財篇 5.創業專業知識->行銷管理篇 6.創業專業知識->資訊管理篇 7.創業專業知識->生產管理及產品研發 8.創業專業知識->人力資源及組織規劃 9.企業營運計畫書撰寫 10.企業營運財務試算 11.企業創業實務篇->加盟連鎖管理(1)--(8) 12.企業創業實務篇->個店經營管理(1)-(2)
description.en: The main content of this course include: 1. Environmental analysis. 2. The key factor to successfully start an enterprise. 3. SWOT analysis. 4. Financial forecast and financial management. 5. Marketing management. 6. Informational management. 7. Manufacturing management and new product design. 8. Human resources and organization management. 9. Start-an-enterprise operating program. 10.The try-balance-sheet of starting an enterprise. 11.Case study of a famous successful joined-ventured company. 12.Case study of a famous successful new-factional enterprise.

description.zh: 以營利模式方法對企業，產業進行分析。研究宏觀經濟與企業生存的關係，以個案或個別產業為例深入研究。將研究結果應用於企業管理與投資。
description.en: Application of profit model's analytical tool to analyze an enterprise in depth. The same method is also applied to analyze an industrial sector. The objectives are to help a business in business decision making in order to improve its profitability.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使同學瞭解國際投資理論，認識國際資本市場、投資工具、分析架構與投資管理技巧。內容包括：國際金融環境、外匯市場、國際投資決策、國際融資決策、國際營運資金管理等。使得同學們不論是身為投資人或財務經理人，在面對全球化與多變化的金融環境下，皆能做出最佳的投資決策。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand the fundamental theory of international investment, the international capital markets, the investment tools, the analysis structure as well as the investment skills. The topics covered in this class include: international financial environment, foreign exchange markets, international investment decisions, international financing decisions, and international working capital management. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best investment decisions under the globalized and changeable financial environment.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育哲學領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 口語言談或書寫篇章的整段言詞構成一個意義單位，表達某種溝通意義及意圖。用詞遣字最需要的是語言運用的條理性，包括上下文高度一致以及邏輯緊密連貫。此課程將利用道地英文文章為基礎來分析英文篇章詞句中的語意架構。這種實際操作的目標在於幫助學生發展英文寫作技巧，同時也訓練思考能力。此課程可能包括以下議題： 	英語/文的合理表達方式及結構 	母語的語言/概念基模對於外語言詞表達的影響 	字彙/言詞適當性與意識型態的關係 	英文中習慣與創新的言詞模式及字彙選擇 	構成英語文溝通模式的價值與信念系統 	外語社會文化語意貼切所需之認知精確度與概念流利度
description.en: Discourse as a stretch of spoken or written language constitutes a semantic unit to convey certain communicative meanings and intentions. It demands an orderly use of language in terms of a high level of lexical cohesion as well as logical coherence. This course will employ real-world English writing as a springboard to the analysis and understanding of semantic scaffolding of a discourse. Such a practice aims to help students develop skills in English writing along with those in critical thinking. Topics to be addressed may include the following: 	The sense-making expressions and structures in English;  	The impacts of L1 linguistic/conceptual schemas on the L2 discourse; 	The lexical/discursive appropriateness in relation to ideological complexes; 	The conventional and creative discursive patterns and lexical choices in English; 	The system of values and beliefs that constitutes the English-language communication mode;  	The cognitive sophistication and conceptual fluency

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

name.zh: 當代流行小說與英語教學
name.en: Contemporary Popular Fiction and English Teaching

description.zh: 當代英美流行小說,例如:帶珍珠耳環的少女,時空旅人之妻,姊姊的守護者,暮光之城系列等等,主題推陳出新,內容扣人心弦,有的反應當前的文化議題,有的表現出創新的文學想像,在在都激發著同學們閱讀原文小說的興趣.又由於小說的書寫語言為當今英語世界所使用,沒有年代隔閡,所以原文流行小說也是優良的英語學習材料.在字彙,片語,句型,段落及文章結構,到故事情節發展與深入探討主題的每個層面上,都提供了豐富的素材,供同學們學習觀摩.因此,本課程將挑選不同類型之時下英美流行小說四本,每月一本,規劃進度,在課堂上進行導讀與討論,並加強字彙,句型,與文章結構上的分析,幫助同學們在英語書寫,閱讀技巧,跨文化了解與思辨能力上,獲得最大的進步!
description.en: Contemporary popular novels originally written in English, such as the Girl with a Pearl Earring, the Time Traveler’s Wife, and the Twilight, have a strong appeal to readers worldwide, but non-native English speakers often enjoy these works in translated versions or film adaptations. To encourage our students to read these popular English novels in the original language, the instructor will choose four novels of various subject matters and use them as effective teaching materials in the classroom. The objectives are (1) to enrich students’ cultural background knowledge of the English speaking world today, (2) to cultivate students’ life-long reading habit of keeping up contemporary materials, and (3) to strengthen their critical thinking as well as language skills, especially reading and writing, through line-by-line close readings in the context and guided discussions on the narrative structures of the whole fiction.

name.zh: 通俗文化中的莎士比亞

description.zh: 莎翁與通俗文化有什麼關係呢？莎翁的作品不是難以理解嗎？欣賞莎翁的作品不需要特別的訓練、時間、與長期的投資嗎？這些問題的答案可以同時是肯定和否定的。不論您喜歡與否，在當代的文化裡，莎翁無所不在。Paul Prescott已經指出：「莎翁的蹤影並不局限於教室、大學、劇場等正式場合，而是在電影、電視、新聞小報、電玩、流行音樂、連環漫畫、及廣告等大眾媒體上到處可見。」確實，莎翁早已是無可迴避的圖像。他的語言文字、人物、劇本情節已經在通俗的大眾媒體上受到廣泛的挪用。「通俗文化中的莎士比亞」是為了有意於為了各種目的而挪用莎翁作品內容之學生，包括以「通俗莎士比亞」作為英語文教材之中小學教師，而設計之英文課程。為了瞭解，甚至挪用莎翁作品內容的複雜性與其中蘊含之永恆不變、舉世皆然的真理，我們將透過電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇等媒介，以異於傳統的反向方式間接研習莎翁作品的珍貴特質與內容，以瞭解社會大眾為了有效達成商業、文化、及政治的目的，是如何挪用莎翁作品。修習本課程的學生亦可推薦有助於未來透過通俗莎翁進行英語文教學之電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇，作為上課教材。
description.en: What has Shakespeare to do with popular culture? Are his writings not difficult and more or less inaccessible? Does it not require special training, time and long-term investment to appreciate Shakespeare? Well, the answer might be yes and no. Like it or not, Shakespeare is everywhere in contemporary culture. As Paul Prescott has pointed out, “His presence is not confined to the ‘official’ locations of classrooms, universities and theatres, but permeates popular mass media such as cinema, television, tabloid journalism, computer games, pop music, comics and advertisements.” Indeed, Shakespeare has long been an inescapable icon. His words, characters, and plots have been widely appropriated to appear across a range of popular mass media. This course is designed to introduce Shakespeare to those who are interested in appropriating Shakespeare for various purposes, including teaching and learning English through what Douglas Lanier has called “Shakespop.” To appreciate the complexit

description.zh: 本課程是針對欲深入了解自1492至今美國文學的高中教師和碩士學生所設。教材囊括以口述記錄的歷史傳說、戲劇、兒童文學或是歷史紀錄。其中部分的教材會交由學生先預習，另一部分則在課堂上演練。希望透過實際演練讓學生可以應用於他們自己的課堂上。本課程除了主要的研究論文發表，課堂上的實際演練、課堂作業以及學生參與程度都會列入評分標準。
description.en: This course is designed for the high school teacher and for any graduate student who wants a thorough background in the history of American literature from 1492 to the present. Texts may include stories recorded from oral tradition, letters, autobiography, novels, poems, short stories, plays, children’s literature, and/or historical documents. Some texts will be read outside of class; others will be read/acted in class, allowing students to come away with practical teaching ideas for their own classes. This course, instead of culminating in a major seminar paper, is graded based on sample teaching demonstrations, shorter writing assignments, and student participation.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 神話文本為我們提供了口述前例。雖說神話文本展現了人究竟是人的事實，卻也啟發了我們以不同於標準模式洞悉現實的方式。我們將透過由Carl Jung, Joseph Campbell, Victor Turner and Gebser等理論家的人類學觀點，檢視如the Descent of Inanna, the Epic of Gilgamesh, the Popul Vuh等之遠古神話文本，連同現代神話，包括Saint John of the Cross, the Great Vision of Black Elk, Beelzebub’s Tales to his Grandson等詩作。我們將追溯與之相關的詩歌及占卜預測等根源，藉以展現人類藝術動力雖然隨著歷史文化及環境而有差異，在現代之音樂、詩歌、小說裡，卻仍然得以產生共鳴的事實。只消閱讀偉大的藍調傳統，當代作家Nathanial Mackey, Nathaniel Braithwaite and Cecilia Vinuna等人的詩作，以及Jack London, Isabelle Allende and Gabriel Garcia Marquez等人的小說，便足以印證前述所言不虛。課程要求包括定期之日記，多次的口頭報告及撰寫兩篇文章。
description.en: Mythic texts provide us clues to their own orally-transmitted antecedents and, though showing us humans have always been humans, suggest a qualitatively different way of perceiving reality than is currently the norm. We will examine mythic texts from the most ancient times--the Descent of Inanna, the Epic of Gilgamesh, the Popul Vuh--alongside more modern works--the poems of Saint John of the Cross, the Great Vision of Black Elk, Beelzebub`s Tales to his Grandson--through an anthropological lens provided in part by theorists Carl Jung, Joseph Campbell, Victor Turner and Jean Gebser.  We will trace back to their roots both poetry and its close relation divination, and show how the artistic impulse in humanity, though varying much according to history, culture and environment, still has echoes in the music, poetry and novels of modern times—just witness the great blues tradition; contemporary poetry by Nathanial Mackey, Nathaniel Braithwaite and Cecilia Vicuna; and fiction by Jack Londo

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

description.zh: 課程概述另訂，依需要於暑期延聘當代工程科技專家作1-3學分之講學。可重複修習，但畢業最多承認3學分。
description.en: The course in summer vacation discussed the popular technology engineer for need.

name.en: Special Topic on plastic metal working

description.zh: 塑性加工概論、金屬變形機構、冷作加工、鈑金成形理論、塑性加工產品檢驗、塑性加工機械與模具、個案討論。
description.en: Introduction to plastic metal working, Metal forming mechanism and mechanics, Cold working, Sheet metal forming, Product inspection and quality control, Metal forming machines and tools, and Case study.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 介紹使用光學的流體量測技術，內容有流體量測之定性的光學顯影技術及定量的光學量測技術，在顯影技術方面包括~Shadow, Schlieren, Laser Light Sheet~等，在定量的光學量測方面則有使用~Coherent Light~的~Interferometry,Holography~等，授課方式除了讓學習者了解各種光學量測技術外，更讓學習者完全了解光學應用技術的原理。
description.en: The course will introduce the optical techniques for measurements of fluids. The contents include the qualitative techniques for flow visualization and the quantitative techniques. The qualitative techniques for flow visualization include the shadow, the schlieren, the laser light sheet, etc., and the quantitative techniques have the interferometries and holography which applies the coherent light, and so on. The lectures will not only introduce the measuring techniques, but also explain their physical principles.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

name.zh: 醫療器材智慧財產權工程
name.en: Intellectual properties engineering on medical devices

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解智慧財產權在醫療器材領域之應用，尤其是專利之佈局，課程中會介紹產業發展趨勢與專利之關係。利用專利資訊進行產品設計與創新工程，也是學習之重點，醫療器材專利價值評估與其管理，亦為本課程之相關內容。
description.en: Course purpose:1. To describe how to use intellectual properties in medical device field2. To use patent information on medical device designs and to do the designing around3. To know patent value and IP managementTo understand how the medical device industry related to IP portfolio

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

name.zh: 高科技專利之財產取得與應用
name.en: The obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent

description.zh: 「高科技專利之財產取得與應用」內容包括：專利的意涵與其重要法規, 專利實體審查基準, 專利審查實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵權鑑定, 專利舉發實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵害及訴訟實例分析, 專利行政救濟, 簡易專利地圖製作, 專利分析與其戰略佈局, 專利迴避應用與技術創新, 技術產權管理相關理論的熟悉與運用。
description.en: The contents of "the obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent" comprises: the meaning of the patent and important rules of patent, patent substantive examination procedures, reading and analyzing about patent substantive examination cases, patent infringement verification, reading and analyzing cases for patent invalidation action, analyzing cases for patent infringement and litigation, patent administrative remedy, fabrication of simple patent map, patent analysis and strategy, application of patent around and technical innovation, and familiarity and exercise of related theories of technique property.

name.zh: 企業資源規劃與供應鏈管理
name.en: Enterprise Resource Planning and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 企業資源規劃系統(ERP)中之配銷、生產製造與財務模組與企業供應鏈管理的各個物流環節密不可分。本課程以供應鏈管理的角度出發，將物流管理中之各個程序與ERP系統中之各個模組結合介紹。課程中包含了SAP ERP的實機操做、系統導入規劃程序、專案管理技術與ERP個案導入案例分享。
description.en: There are three modules of the enterprise resource planning (ERP) system, including: the modules of sale and distribution, production and manufacture and finance. Each module of the ERP system is inseparable from the logistics management of supply chain management (SCM). The course is designed from the SCM perspective and integrated with the modules for ERP system. The course contains the operation instructions for SAP ERP system, the process planning of ERP system implementation, the skills of project management and the case studies of ERP implementation.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

name.zh: 雲端運算與巨量資料管理
name.en: Cloud Computing and Big Data Management

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，因而顧客可隨時取用Web化的網路資源、軟體或資料。本課程在雲端方面主要內容包含雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算的核心技術、多人租用控制、雲端運算的服務模式、雲端運算應用架構及服務管理、雲端運算的安全/私密/信任管理議題、雲端運算的發展策略以及結論。 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，已產生巨量的資料，如何處理與儲存巨量資料、如何從巨量資料中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與儲存巨量資料、如何將巨量資料表示圖型結構、以及如何更進一步從巨量的圖型結構進行探勘等議題。
description.en: Cloud Computing is a new model for enabling convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction. This course covers Cloud Computing: An Overview, Core Technologies of Cloud Computing, Cloud Service Models, Multi-tenancy Control, Cloud Application Architecture and Service Management, Developing Strategies in Cloud Computing and conclusion. With the development of cloud computing services and Internet services, it has generated a very huge amount of data. How to handle and store this huge amount of data and how to mine useful knowledge from the massive data have become popular research topics. The contents of this course also include how to handle and store huge amount of data, and how the massive amount of data is represented by graph structures, as well as how to further mine and other issues from the huge amount of graph structures.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 介紹有機材料：如染料、界面活性劑、添加劑、單體、生物活性物質等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用等。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

name.zh: 液氣壓混合動力車特論
name.en: Special Topics on Hydraulic and Pneumatic Hybrid Vehicle

description.zh: 傳統車輛卻往往因為間歇式行駛模式，最容易產生大量廢氣及油耗汙染。雖然純電動車具有高 效能與及低汙染的特性，但行駛距離的受限與電池價格昂貴。而油電混合車雖然可以達到環保節能的目的，但跟傳統車輛來比仍昂貴許多。液壓混合動力車仍以引擎作動，需要加速時與其他動力源交替使用，等液壓系統蓄能器用盡再回到傳統引擎運作，與泵浦馬達配合利用剎車產生的動力回收，此循環模式回收再利用，以達到節省耗油及降低污染功用，特論將討論其相關技術與理論。
description.en: The traditional vehicle is often in intermittent mode, most likely to produce a lot of pollution emissions and fuel consumption. Though an electric vehicle with high efficiency and low pollution characteristics, yet the range is limited and batteries are expensive. Hybrid cars can achieve the objective of environmental protection and energy saving, but they are still expensive compared to conventional vehicles. Hydraulic hybrid vehicles use engines and hydraulic motor/pump as alternate power source. The energy storage elements are high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators thanks.  With the aid of hydraulic motor/pump and high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators’ thanks, the brake-generated power recovery is achieved and reused in turn for acceleration. This special topic focus on the related technologies and theories.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

name.en: Introduction to Mobile and Wireless Systems

description.zh: (1)行動通訊概念，(2)行動無線電傳遞，(3)通訊蜂巢概念，(4)無線電通道配置法，(5)行動網路系統，(6)行動路由法， (7)網路通訊協約，(8)簡述WMAN, WLAN, and WPAN，(9)行動隨意與無線感測網路，(10)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Mobile Communication Concept,(2)Mobile Radio Propagation,(3)Cellular Concept,(4)Radio Channel Allocation,(5)Mobile Network Systems,(6)Mobile Routing,(7)Network Protocols,(8)Wireless MANs, LANs, and PANs,(9)Mobile Ad Hoc and Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 壹、保護創新	  1. 如何透過專利保護科技創新  2. 專利的迷思貳、專利概念與規法	  1. 我國專利體系介紹   2. 專利相關法規之介紹  3. 專利取得的流程參、發明專利實體審查基	  1. 專利說明書及圖示的撰寫格式   2. 何謂發明單一性   3. 優先權的使用  4. 說明書之補充、修正、更正  5. 專利權期間之延長肆、專利說明書搜尋及閱讀	  1. 各國專利的搜尋引擎  2. 專利工具的使用  3. 閱讀專利說明書伍、專利說明書的撰寫與申請	  1. 專利說明書撰寫之重要  2. 專利說明書之格式  3. 專利說明書之撰寫技巧陸、專利與創新	  1. 如何由需求或靈感取得創新  2. 如何使創新轉化為實質專利  3. 如何從專利撰寫演化出創新柒、專利戰略與佈局	  1. 如何利用專利在商場上作戰  2. 專利佈局模式捌、專利舉發實務	  1. 專利舉發方式  2. 專利舉發程序  3. 專利舉發策略運用  4. 舉發撤銷要件玖、專利侵害及訴訟實例 	  1. 從案例中學習專利侵害的攻防與法院訴訟的爭點。壹拾、		  1.專家演講(法官，技審官，審查官，律師)	邀請領域的專家分享實務經驗
description.en: 1. Patent Protection2. Patent Law3.Patent Search and Reading4. Patent writing and application5. Patent and Innovation6. Patent Examination Procedure7. Patent Strategy8. patent invalidation9. Patent Infringement and Suit10. Special Topics

notes: 與職二子四及子五合開綜科503

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

notes: 技術組/管理組 限25人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

notes: 管理組/產學合作中心201教室

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.zh: 醫藥智財權實務問題研究
name.en: Intellectual Property Rights in the Pharmaceutical Industry

description.zh: 本課程將介紹藥物智慧財產權之特色，主要適用之法律為專利法、藥事法、營業秘密法、孤兒藥法等等。其次，本課程將透過案例之探討，將醫藥科技與智財法規連結，以幫助學生了解實務上之運作。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction of Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) in the pharmaceutical industry. Topics will mainly include IP laws related to pharmaceutical drugs such as Patent Law, Pharmaceutical Affairs Law, Trade Secrets Law, Orphan Drug Law, and so on. Also, the professor will discuss various pharmaceutical issues in combination with medical technology and IP regulations in order to help students understand the actual practice in this domain.

description.zh: 如英文概述內容所述。
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

description.zh: 品質管理的基本觀念、原理、領域，品管部門的組織、功能，品管的工具、方法，品質表示法，品質管理成效評估，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢
description.en: Fundamental concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, Organization and functions of quality department, Tools and methods of quality control, Quality representation method, Evaluation of quality control, Related regulations and future trends of quality management.

description.zh: 本課程使學生充分瞭解燃料電池專業學科基礎知識，並進一步啟發及增進學生未來能源科技發展知能。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池系統簡介、燃料電池效率及開迴路電壓、燃料電池工作電壓、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池電力傳輸、燃料電池系統分析。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basics of professional disciplines of the fuel cell, and to further inspire and enhance the knowledge of students about future energy technology. Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell system, Efficiency and open voltage, Operational fuel cell voltages, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Delivering fuel cell power, Analysis of fuel cell system.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將探討語音訊號的相關的各種基礎知識與處理技術，包括語音辨認，語音合成與口語對話系統等，並將檢視數個具目前最先進技術的系統，使學生能建立語音信號處理技術之基本知識及能力。課程內容包括：*語音的產生，語音訊號聲學特性與語音知覺的原理*語音分析*語音辨識*語音合成*口語對話系統*目前最先進技術系統*相關進階議題
description.en: In this course, we will introduce fundamental speech signal processing techniques, including speech recognition, speech synthesis and spoken dialogue system and examine some state-of-the-art systems.Content:*Overview of Speech Processing Techniques*Speech Production, Acoustic Phonetics and Psychoacoustic Phenomena*Speech Analysis*Speech Recognition*Speech Synthesis*Spoken Dialog System*State-of-the-Art Systems*Selected Advanced Topics

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Introduction to Mobile Wireless Communications,(2)Wireless Internet and LANs,(3)Mobile Ad Hoc Wireless Networks (MANET),(4)MAC Protocols for MANET,(5)Multiple Routing in MANET,(6)QoS in MANET,(7)Security Protocols for MANET,(8)Energy Management in MANET,(9)Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Hybrid Wireless Networks(11)	Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

notes: 電通所與電資國際班合開

description.zh: 1.導論2.無失真壓縮技術3.量化與轉換編碼4.動作估計與動作補償5.MPEG視訊編碼標準6.視訊編碼在傳輸時的考量7.無線傳播通道8.無線通訊系統之數位調變技術9.無線通訊系統之通道編碼技術10.多重路徑衰落通道之應對技術11.無線多媒體通訊系統與標準
description.en: 1.Introductions 2.Entropy coding 3.Rate-distortion theory and quantization 4.Motion compensation and Interframe coding5.MPEG video coding 6.Multimedia transmission 7.Wireless propagation channels 8.Digital modulation in wireless systems 9.Channel coding in wireless systems 10.Schemes to overcome multipath fading 11.Standards of wireless multimedia communication systems

notes: 電通所與電資國際班合開

name.zh: 互動式娛樂服務之音訊處理技術
name.en: Audio Signal Processing for Interactive Entertainment Services

description.zh: 本課程講述音訊處理技術之理論與實務，並著重於互動式娛樂服務之應用。理論部分包括聲音訊號的分析與辨識、電子音樂的產生、內涵式音樂檢索原理、以及空間音場等問題介紹。透過實際應用的探討，使學生獲得理論知識與設計創意。實務部分則以卡拉OK服務平台為核心，於課後作業及期末專題實作中，藉由軟體模擬、DSP開發平台、與手持行動裝置的程式設計，使學生應用電子音樂技術、音樂檢索技術、與空間音場原理來實現一卡拉OK系統，突破一般居家或手持行動裝置的功能限制，提升歌唱情境。
description.en: The course is designed to equip students with knowledge and skills in audio signal processing, particularly in the applications of interactive entertainment services. It covers both theory and practice of audio signal analysis and recognition, electronic music production, content-based music retrieval, and spatial audio effects. Through the use of personal computers, DSP platforms, and handheld devices, students will learn to apply the audio signal processing techniques to the design of interactive karaoke services.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 1.高頻介質材料特性 2.介質共振器簡介 3.圓柱型介電波導理論4.簡易共振模型分析法 5.精密分析法 6.介質共振器耦合特性7.介質共振器之高頻電路應用
description.en: 1.The Characteristics of High-frequency Dielectric Materials2.The Introduction of Dielectric Resonators3.Theory of Cylindrical Dielectric Waveguides4.Simple Resonate Model for Analysis5.Rigorous Analysis Methods6.The Characteristis of Coupling7.The DR's Practical applications at High Frequencies

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.多頻帶射頻接收機架構及鏈路預算2.多頻帶射頻接收機電路設計3.多頻帶射頻發射機架構及鏈路預算4.多頻帶射頻發射機電路設計5.多頻帶壓控振盪器與鎖相迴路設計學生能從這門課學習到多頻射頻收發系統的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.Architecture, Link Budget, and Circuit Design of Multi-band RF Receiver 2.Architecture, Link Budget, and Circuit Design of Multi-band RF Transmitter3.Design of Multi-band VCOs and PLLThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of multi-band RF transceiver system from this course.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

name.zh: 創新講座－產品與服務創新策略
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation strategy

description.zh: 本課程目標在教導學生針對台灣目前經濟發展過程中，所面臨之問題透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品，經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，使學術與產業進行交流拉近產學之距離。
description.en: This course aims to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. Through lectures and conferences with industry experts, this course will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation strategy. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.

notes: 四設三、創新所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 有別於傳統市場學，「設計行銷」是強調以「設計」為核心價值的行銷策略與概念。透過整合各設計領域的知識與技能與適當的研究方法運用，企業可望在傳統行銷途徑之外更有效的行銷其產品或服務。
description.en: Other from traditional Marketing, Design Marketing stresses the value of centering design in marketing strategy. Through the integration of design notions and research methods, industries may find it essential in promoting products or services in addition to general marketing approaches.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-全球化企業經營策略
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Business Strategies of Global Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新服務

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

name.zh: 低碳經濟與低碳社會建構

description.zh: 21世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳化已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 先修課程︰熱傳學本課程主要針對冷凍系統隔熱與熱傳技術作更深入探討，學生以修習過大學部" 熱傳學" 三學分之課程，本課程主要闡述︰1. 熱傳導理論2. 隔熱材料性質3. 真空保溫技術4. 真空保溫材料性質5. 冷凍系統隔熱設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of insulation technology for a refrigeration system.The course includes the following subjects:1. Theory of heat conduction 2. The property of insulation materials3. Outline of vacuum insulation technology  4. The property of vacuum insulation materials5. Design of insulation for refrigeration systems.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：審計及會計專業、AICPA Top10 Technologies、AIS research methods、IT technologies、查核規劃、Risk analysis、Security management、內部控制結構等。本課程將介紹的主題如下： ◆會計資訊系統之重要性和意義 ◆會計資訊系統與內外環境的關係 ◆資料處理作業程序中的五大功能 ◆內部控制與會計資系統 ◆資訊系統的工具與技術 ◆系統開發 ◆資料庫管理 ◆會計實務軟體的介紹與操作 ◆介紹有關AIS研究之分類及內容。 ◆新興的AIS研究課題及資訊應用。
description.en: Accounting information systems courses will provide the discussion on the areas of auditing and accounting profession, AICPA Top10 Technologies, AIS research methods, IT technologies, Risk analysis, Security management and Internal control, etc. In completing this course, the student's objectives will be ... 1. To develop an awareness of recent developments in accounting information systems technology. 2. To become familiar with, and gain research interests in the continuous auditing, accounting information systems and recently development of CAATs. 3. To become aware of the relationship between accounting information systems and the other subsystems that comprise management information systems, and to understand the role of accountants as designers, users, and evaluators of information systems. To gain experience working successfully in group settings.

description.zh: 本課程針對財務管理基本原理並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，內容涵蓋：財務規劃與預測、資本預算決策、營運資金政策、長短期融資決策、股利政策、資本資產定價理論、套利定價理論、投資組合理論、合併與收購、行為財務…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務策略研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: This course is case study approach, for the financial management theory to discuss relevant issues with financial decision-making. Seminar covers: Financial planning and forecasting, capital budgeting decisions, working capital policy, short-term and long-term financing decisions, dividend policy, capital asset pricing theory, arbitrage pricing theory, portfolio theory, mergers and acquisitions, behavioral finance, etc. This course combines business management practices and financial strategies into the discussion, in order to foster both theory and practice of financial management personnel. Through the course of the attendance, students should be able to have the financial management of the academic ability to integrate knowledge and expertise, the ability of independent research, critical thinking and decision-making capacity, and ability to solve financial management problems.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

name.en: Special Topics on Regional Geology of Taiwan

description.zh: 臺灣島位於西太平洋，就板塊構造運動而言，臺灣上新－更新世的造山運動代表歐亞大陸板塊的前緣和其東側以西北方向前進的菲律賓海洋板塊間的衝撞聚合運動。東臺灣花蓮和臺東間的縱谷，已被認為是兩個板塊間的縫合帶和板塊聚合的邊緣。在臺灣的北部，大陸和島弧的碰撞型式可能是菲律賓海板塊向北傾沒到位於歐亞大陸板塊上的琉球島弧系統之下。但是向南沿東臺灣縱谷，在北緯二十四度以南，板塊隱沒方向發生改變，歐亞大陸板塊於此向東隱沒進入菲律賓海板塊之下。此一特殊的板塊背景造就了臺灣多樣的地質現象‧本課程之內容主要探討台灣地區(包括海域)自中生代至現代的大地構造演變及其地體構造運動、盆地演化、岩石圈的結構及性質、造山運動機制等各種地質現象。希望能藉由瞭解臺灣區域地質，從而作為探討臺灣地質工程與環境領域之基礎‧
description.en: Taiwan island is located on the weastern Pacific Ocean. The plate tectonic setting of Taiwan is the convergence and collision between the western Eurasian plate and the easterly impinging Philippine Sea plate on the Pli-Pleistocene. The Longitudinal Valley between Hualien and Taitung in eastern Taiwan has been recognized as the suture zone between these two plates. In northeastern Taiwan, convergence is marked by northward subduction of the Philippine Sea plate beneath the Ryukyu Arc System on the Eurasian plate along the Ryukyu Trench. The subduction polarity changes at 24°N near Hualien in eastern Taiwan. There plate convergence is marked by eastward subduction of the Eurasian plate underneath the Luzon Arc System on the Philippine Sea plate along the Eastern Longitudinal Valley. description.en: Risk, assessment, risk management and risk governance have become key concepts in modern society's attempts to manage environmental and health problems connected with human activities and products. The object of this course is to train an integrated interdisciplinary understanding of environmental risks and their management by perspectives and approaches from natural and social sciences. This course also critically examines the role of risk assessment in environmental management by checking the methods used, as well as the underlying theories and assumptions.

description.zh: 常聽到學生或家長說，應屆畢業學生未檢視畢業條件，因不符合畢業門檻致延畢事件，本堂課特從提醒學生「畢業準備好了沒」，如何撰寫中英文自傳與履歷、以中英文自我介紹、到由業界主管與學生現場或透過網路以中英文面試等，希望透過這些課程設計,協助學生總結學校所學課程並加以整理，提升就業準備能力。
description.en: This lesson begins to remind students of "Are you ready to graduate？", and then how to write Chinese and English autobiography and resume, self-introduction with Chinese and English, at the end is the interview by  director of industry in the class or through internet. Hope that through the course designed to help students to summarize and organize what they have learned from school in order to enhance their ability of employment preparation.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供修課學生計算機視覺之基本知識，並引導學員認識Android開發概念，以及計算機視覺程式之設計方法，其設計工具將是使用OpenCV及Eclipse開發工具為主。課程內容分別如下：(1) 影像與視訊的組成(2) 低階視覺之影像處理(3) 影像轉換(4) 影像檢索及分類(5) 影像輪廓與紋理解析(6) 影像分割與聚類(7) 運動分析與追蹤(8) 相機模型與矯正(9) 取樣模型及三維建構(10) 圖形辨識概述與實作(11) 電腦視覺技術為基礎之Android行動裝置設計(12) 低階視覺影像處理之Android行動裝置設計(13) 影像輪廓與紋理解析之Android行動裝置設計 (14) 影像特徵擷取之Android行動裝置設計(15) Android裝置上之即時動態影像處理
description.en: This course includes fundamental and advanced topics in computer vision with a focus on image recognition, machine learning, and applied computer vision principles for Android devices. Advanced topics in computer vision including scene modeling, 3D reconstruction, motion analysis, object tracking, pattern recognition, and mobile computer vision, with embedded Android devices. These subjects could be taken in either order. (1) Image and video formation (2) Low-level visual processing(3) Image transforms(4) Image categorization(5) Contour and texture analysis(6) Segmentation and grouping(7) Motion analysis and visual tracking(8) Camera models and calibration(9) Scene modeling and 3D reconstruction(10) Pattern recognition(11) Mobile computer vision on Android devices(12) Low-level visual processing with Android (13) Contour and texture analysis with Android (14) Feature Detection with Android(15) Real-time computer vision on Android

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.
